articles.title: PBA targets late June to begin Season 46 - CNN Philippines
articles.description: PBA Commissioner Willie Marcial says the league plans to open the 46th season by 'late June or early July' after the FIBA Asia Cup qualifiers in Pampanga.
articles.content:
Metro Manila (CNN Philippines, May 21) The Philippine Basketball Association is planning to open the 46th season by "late June or early July," commissioner Willie Marcial said on Friday.

articles.title: Total of 43 Changi Airport workers test positive for Covid-19 - The Star Online
articles.description: SINGAPORE (The Straits Times/Asia News Network/ANN): A total of 10 airport workers have tested positive for Covid-19 in a special testing operation, out of almost 19,000 workers who were swabbed.

articles.title: Snapchat registers over 100% YoY growth for five consecutive quarters in India | KrASIA - KrASIA
articles.description: Snapchat crossed 60 million users in the last quarter of 2020 in India, where it is deploying a three-pronged approach of localized content, games, and culturally relevant augmented reality experiences.
articles.content:
American social media platform Snap Incs efforts to catch up with global rivals like Facebook, Instagram, Youtube, and Twitter in India seem to be bearing fruit.

articles.title: Scientists in Asia resumed work far quicker than western counterparts, international COVID lockdown - EurekAlert
articles.description: Researchers in China, Japan, and Singapore were able to resume research much quicker than their counterparts in the US and Europe after the first covid lockdowns, results of a new international survey suggest.
